title: Funny Home Run Baker + Shibe postcards SOLD

posts.post_title: Funny Home Run Baker + Shibe postcards SOLD
posts.post_content:
[IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/bicem/teamphotos/Shibe%201.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/bicem/teamphotos/Shibe%202.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/bicem/teamphotos/Shibe%203.jpg[/IMG]

Very tough 1910's postcards depicting the Athletics and fans at Shibe.  Apparently the person who sent the first postcard was not a big Home Run Baker fan!

SOLD
